/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. A red double-decker bus, a common sight in many Chinese cities, is seen driving down the street, adding a vibrant splash of color to the scene. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky, a testament to the city's infrastructure. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
